name: Gimo
tagline: Your Trusted Partner in Earned Wage Access
description: Founded in 2019, Gimo is one of Vietnam's fintech pioneers in Earned Wage Access, that is, providing working adults with instant access to their earned income ahead of a scheduled payday. Targeting underbanked workers, Gimo has set out a mission of addressing urgent financial needs of dozens of millions of workers, thus contributing to the country?s financial inclusion.
